function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate research on flexible apartment design systems may lead to unsatisfactory living spaces in postcovid-19 housing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor thermal conditions and iaq greatly affect occupant health and productivity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy within the home","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized metrics for daylighting levels in apartment housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green landscapes and open spaces in apartment housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urban densification and obstructed views","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in privacy and individual space due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural window views and nature experiences in housing design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to outdoor views during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on directed attention within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited published research on covid-19 and housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in terminology and categorization of housing types","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural and contextual differences in study locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public health regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor building design for health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban densification leading to concentration of apartment housing in urban centers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of restorative environmental design in apartment housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical examples of poor housing design leading to disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to other balconies and shared outdoor spaces can increase the risk of disease transmission between residents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited control over indoor air quality and thermal comfort in small dwellings may lead to poor ventilation and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded shared spaces such as lobbies, elevators, and laundry rooms can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases among residents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and distancing leading to psychological and physical health impacts for residents.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of variability and variety in lighting levels based on new uses of the home.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate environmental design that does not promote wellbeing and comfort.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-density urban housing does not offer restorative experiences for residents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased amount of time spent indoors due to pandemic-related city shutdowns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on occupant wellbeing and health in residential design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study may not apply to future effectiveness of npis in the region","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in the covid-19 epidemic in saudi arabia since the study period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic under-reporting of deaths leading to inaccurate seroprevalence estimates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the influence of other behaviors on disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of homogeneous mixing of people within each region","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the practical impact of npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex interactions of interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in data representation and assumptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled sars-cov-2 transmission with a basic reproductive number close to 2 across regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Considerable uncertainty in estimates of intervention effectiveness, particularly for school closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent results in studies evaluating the effectiveness of interventions such as lockdowns, test/trace/isolate programs, and travel restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large uncertainty in transmission reductions during relaxation phases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in transmission reduction among regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporal changes in the effective reproduction number r eff due to varying npi effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the effectiveness of npi combinations between intervention periods and regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Considerable uncertainty in transmission reduction estimates for npis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous transmission reduction during curfew npis across regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor calibration of national epidemic peaks in may and june","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to estimate the independent effects of specific npis due to overlapping timing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide range of basic reproductive number estimates across different regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using a modeling framework to estimate region-specific parameters for epidemic seeding dates, basic reproduction number, and npi effectiveness may lead to inaccuracies in the estimation of these parameters and their impact on epidemic trajectories.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inference on model parameters for spatial locations based on covid-19 transmission dynamics may lead to biased or oversimplified conclusions about disease transmission in different geographical areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of aggregated observation and simulated variables over longer time periods for model calibration may overlook short-term fluctuations and dynamics in disease transmission, leading to limited accuracy in capturing real-time epidemic trends.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
